attributes.action: Prevent excessive paper waste by companies
attributes.background: Store tills should make printing a receipt optional as so many print automatically and are binned. Also, companies excessively put leaflets that go straight in the bin through front doors, there are so many other paper-free ways to market now that this is unnecessary.

rejection.details:
We understand that you're concerned about paper waste, but we're not sure exactly what action you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to take to reduce it. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
